response.original_title: 人妻たちの性2 ~エロスとリベンジ~
response.overview: Eri's book, which claims that full-time housewives are like livestock kept by their husbands, has become a hot topic. Full-time housewives Tamayo and Hiroko are infuriated by her words and approach Eri's lovers in an attempt to teach Eri a lesson... Female director Matoba Chise powerfully depicts the bottomless sexual desires of women. The unrestrained eroticism of the housewives who claim that they "do not belong to their husbands" heats up and explodes on the screen. A gorgeous cast of actresses including Sakurada Yukari, Kagami Reiko, and Sasaki Motoko co-star in this film.
response.title: Married Women Sex 2: Eros and Revenge

titles.title: Hitodzuma-tachi no sei 2 ~ erosu to ribenji ~
